mapper.select:
select count(*) from noback_messenger where messenger_receiver = (#{searchId})
and upper(messenger_content) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'

select count(*) from noback_member where employee_num = (#{searchId})
and upper(employee_name) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'

select s.employee_num , m.employee_name as messenger_writer_name , s.messenger_content , to_char(s.messenger_date, 'YY/MM/DD') as messenger_date , v.employee_name as messenger_reciever_name from noback_messenger s, noback_member m, noback_member v where s.employee_num = m.employee_num AND s.messenger_receiver = v.employee_num and s.messenger_receiver = (#{searchId})
and upper(s.messenger_content) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'
order by s.messenger_date desc

select employee_num , employee_name , employee_dep , employee_pos , employee_email
from noback_member where employee_num not in (#{searchId})
and upper(employee_name) like '%' || upper(#{search}) || '%'
order by employee_name desc

select
m.employee_name as messenger_writer_name , s.messenger_content , to_char(s.messenger_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') as messenger_date , v.employee_name as messenger_reciever_name
from noback_messenger s, noback_member m, noback_member v where ( ( s.employee_num = (#{num}) AND s.messenger_receiver = (#{searchId}) ) AND ( s.employee_num = m.employee_num AND s.messenger_receiver = v.employee_num ) )
OR ( ( s.employee_num = (#{searchId}) AND s.messenger_receiver = (#{num}) ) AND ( s.employee_num = m.employee_num AND s.messenger_receiver = v.employee_num ) ) order by s.messenger_date asc
